vendors.Name: Abigail Starling
vendors.Desc: I'm a professional comic illustrator, but in addition to comics I have prints, keychains, buttons, and stationery! I love working in a cute and colorful style, and also offer goods for multiple fandoms in addition to Pony!

vendors.Name: Alienkitty Designs
vendors.Desc: Cute japanese inspired creations, with a touch of my own flare. I got buttons, stickers, and charms galore!

vendors.Name: ALOS shop
vendors.Desc:
Good day, everypony, long time no see! 

My name is ALOS and you probably know me as an artist behind: ask Lola Cloudmaker, allthesassinessintheworld, some posts on Ask Night Stitch (all three on tumblr) and I've also been the colorist behind Shino's ""Space Ponyos"" issue #1!

Today for sale I've got:
~Mane 6 face postcards!~
Those wonderfully cute postcards come with a custom message drawn on the other side, and will be shipped directly to YOU through mail! For the total cost of... Dun dun dunnn... 6 Euros! It includes everything, the postcard, the labor and the shipping cost!
For an additional euro I will add a non pony sticker, either randomly or from the selection of  27 different stickers (woo!)
Each additional postcard/sticker/drawing will cost 1 Euro to the original price. You may ask me to remove the drawing and just send you the postcard, which will reduce 1 Euro from the original price.

~Twitch Stream commissions~
From a dumb sketch to a nice profile picture, I can draw it all! 
The prices vary from 3 Euros for a silly sketch, to a 35 Euro of a fullbody drawing in the most complicated shading style possible. 

You may look at all the prices available, if you mess around with this form: 
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdKqpUvwLjZVwnDsJInZ1EQ3UMHg2ulJ2sn_Th1whss4WwqWw/viewform

I highy recommend checking out the lineless section and get the smooth shaded icon (or any of the lineless icons), they look AMAZING on your profile picture!

Anyway, everyone, have a good con!

vendors.Name: Bastlers Plushies and 3D Prints
vendors.Desc:
Small shoulder Plushies (Derpibooru OCs and canon)
Standing Plushies
3D printed Figures (3D Models by DJTHED)
Twilicane and similar Canes (will be made on demand)
3D printed prereformed Changelings

vendors.Name: BefishProductions
vendors.Desc: Your one stop shop for cuties n bees! We've got landyards, charms, buttons, and ESPECIALLY stickers!~ All the cute art for your adorable needs!

vendors.Name: Boiler & Sweetcream
vendors.Desc: Art prints, apparel, pin, books, buttons badges and cards! pillows shirts and sundry! many more items in the story and commissions by request! come and see!

vendors.Name: Captain Showtime
vendors.Desc: Ahoy there! This is yer Captain speakin'! I have a button for everything! Ya like commissions? I got traditional art, digital art, badges, and buttons! I have a lot of treasure to give away! Ya never know what treasure I might have next waiting for ya!

vendors.Name: Compman Crafts Creations
vendors.Desc:
Compy is an artist based in California that's loves making pony art over anything else! They love creating art of all different mediums including but not limited to: crochet, cross stitch, pixel art, animation, sculpting/figure customizing, drawing, character design, painting, and drawing!

Ok I just wanted to add a few things, don't add this to the description. I don't have the ability to take pictures of my current works right now, and I don't have them posted on my social media, but I have examples of my stuff here: https://sta.sh/22adfmhiyy3i 

I plan on making a few pieces of bit rate that could be a few of the following: A crochet plush, a cross stitch piece with custom pixel art, a multi-layered felt piece, and a customized g4 figure. I plan on auctioning these off and giving part of the profits to coronavirus relief!

vendors.Name: CosmicKeyframe Productions
vendors.Desc: posters, prints, buttons, charms, clocks, framed papercrafts

vendors.Name: Dawnfire's Art
vendors.Desc: I sell prints, acrylic charms, lanyards, glasses cloths, bookmarks, stickers, and special crayon commissions taken only during PonyFest!

vendors.Name: Discounted Shipping
vendors.Desc: Everything is on sale over at shipfic.co! Be ready for the next convention season, stock up on all your Twilight Sparkle's Secret Shipfic Folder (TSSSF) game essentials and save 20% on Core Decks. All Mini Expansions are buy 2 get 1 free. Are you ready to help Twilight fulfill her narrative goals and make the ponies kiss for points?

vendors.Name: dojerodesigns
vendors.Desc:
DojeroDesigns is a LGBTQA+ freelance illustrator whom enjoys creating merchandise and memories through DnD, memes, furry, anime, and everything creepy and cute!
Buttons, stickers, prints, pins, coin bags, pencil bags, mousepads, at table commissions, custom badges, lanyards, keychains, and more!

vendors.Name: Dori-to
vendors.Desc: Hi, I'm Dori-to and I love making comics! I also love drawing vehicles and silly stuff. I will be selling physical copies of my comic book and prints of my artwork.

vendors.Name: dSana Store
vendors.Desc: >>>>FEELS, DRAMA & SHIPPING! Grab your copy of my PDF fancomics, including "A Storm's Lullaby Book 1" with bonus content -- or order physical copies of official IDW comic with my covers on it -- signed if you wish! <<<<

vendors.Name: fannytastical
vendors.Desc: fannytastical's got ya covered for acrylic charms, buttons, dakimakura, apparel and more!

vendors.Name: FluffPawsDraws
vendors.Desc: Hello! I sell digital art commissions, as well as high quality t shirts, hoodies, tank tops, leggings, die cut stickers and more!

vendors.Name: Glittery Glisten
vendors.Desc: Hi my name is Glittery Glisten! I've been a Furry artist for around 15 years and I'm new to the Brony fandom and wish to draw more ponies!!  I design, sell, and print mlp and furry merch such as shirts, mugs, decals, and much more. I print the mugs and vinyl shirts in house while full color shirts are done through Red Bubble.  I also take commissions from art to custom designed shirts, mugs, and more. I'm your one stop  pony shop!

vendors.Name: Hibiscus Stitch
vendors.Desc: Here at Hibiscus Stitch, I sell professionally crafted hoof-made  plushies of all sizes and price points. Iâ€™ve been hoof-making plush for about 16 years now and I make sure each of them are the best for your snuggling and collecting needs! We also have buttons for those of you who want to sport pride for your favorite Equestrian! Please consider adopting a soft friend today. All plush made from the softest Minky with embroidered eyes, cutie marks, and details!

vendors.Name: Hyper Dash
vendors.Desc: Hello! I'm Hyper Dash, and I make pony animations! I also make animations that don't move (also known as drawings)! I'm currently offering digital commissions of both art and animation, as well as traditional art commissions! There are also new shirt designs on my Teeupublic that you'll be able to pick up on sale for $14 this weekend! You can also purchase any of my Teepublic designs on the full array of available products, such as mugs, notebooks, pillow, and even masks!

vendors.Name: Japan Brony Artist Team
vendors.Desc: Manga books, Acrylic charms, Art commissions by Michiyoshi

vendors.Name: KAT! Illustration and Artwork
vendors.Desc: Elegance and cute, prints, stickers and more!

vendors.Name: kawaiipony2 / DShou
vendors.Desc: We sell MLP and Anime related merch! Prints, Charms. Dakis, and more!

vendors.Name: LeJenndary Shoppe
vendors.Desc: Merch and apparel

vendors.Name: Lytlelemurart
vendors.Desc: Indie Comics /Prints/ and Commissions

vendors.Name: MidnightPremiere
vendors.Desc: Howdy! I am selling posters, buttons, lens cloths, zesty memes, and all sorts of doodads! I realized that flat-rate boxes don't care HOW much you stuff in those babies, so grab a Mystery Box from me for a bit of everything!

vendors.Name: Miss Mele's Madness
vendors.Desc:
Hello! I'm miss Bramble Mele and welcome to my Madness! I am a small up and coming digital artist here to bring you custom and affordable merchandise and digital art commissions! I am pretty new to the vending game so I hope to please with the fruits of my labors and hope not to disappoint. Next to digital communications, you can find my art on my redbubble account where you'll find Mele Merchandise from clothing to bedding to bathroom accessories!  Here's where you'll find that: https://www.redbubble.com/people/missmelemadness/shop

From prints, to charms, button badges, stickers and mugs, I sell it all! Pay no more than $20 for one item in my shop and come back wanting more!

vendors.Name: Moonbeam Designs
vendors.Desc:
I have all kinds of custom pieces available - from badges to sticker sheets and many things in between! You want something unique to you and your character? You can find it here!
I also have sticker sheets, individual stickers, and unique ponyfest badges available!
I'm able to draw furries, animals, ponies, and humans :3
Stop by, I have something for everyone!

vendors.Name: My Little Ties
vendors.Desc: Ties, bow ties, lapel pins, keychains, necklaces, flasks, shot glasses, dog tags, bottle openers, omamori (japanese good luck charms), LED glowing badges, lots of other stuff

vendors.Name: Out of Work Derpy Arts
vendors.Desc: The mane item I will be selling is my 'Out of Work Derpy: a Derpy Magic Show' Comic! (it comes with a free surprise inside ;3c) I will also be selling some TSSSF cards (out of work derpy expansion) , animated cards, trixie Aces cards, regular and holographic posters, art prints, buttons, some commissions, ect.  You can check everything out at the store: christomancy.square.site/

vendors.Name: Perry Does Things
vendors.Desc: We're still in the midst of struggling with job search and finances, so I'm back with more goodies and appreciative of any and all support you decide to throw my way! I'll be offering more PonyFest merch, my own prints and hopefully a new pillow or mug or even both - Plus the Pay What You Want Commissions return! Check out my channel and get in touch <3

vendors.Name: Peruser's Plushies
vendors.Desc: Proudly making pony plushies since 2013!  I make plushies of all shapes and sizes.  If you have a certain pony in mind, ask me about a commission!

vendors.Name: PiriPaints (Pony Stickers & Pillows)
vendors.Desc: Stickers, Posters and Pillows

vendors.Name: PlanetPlush
vendors.Desc: Handmade plush, commissions, manufactured plush, pins, charms

vendors.Name: Ruef n' Beeb
vendors.Desc: Ruef n' Beeb are a fandom dynamic duo selling all sorts of merchandise, including t-shirts, enamel pins, body pillow covers and much, much more!

vendors.Name: Sam Neukirch
vendors.Desc: I'm a old-school pony vendor (sold at the first BroNYCon like 200 years ago) who recently came back to brony conventions and is having a blast! My virtual table has tons of original and fan art buttons (pony and non-pony), some bird keychains, zines, and more. You can commission me for custom badges or pins that I will mail to you, too! Check out my table at http://samdoesart.com/virtualcontable/

vendors.Name: Screwy Embroidery
vendors.Desc: Custom Embroidery

vendors.Name: spacekitsch
vendors.Desc: I sell cute and colorful enamel pins, acrylic keychains, and stickers. I also take digital commissions!

vendors.Name: Techycutie
vendors.Desc: Hey I'm Techy! I sell a large assortment of cute pony keychains as well as buttons, enamel pins, mouse pads, and body pillows. We get new stuff every few weeks, so there's always something new in store! Literally!

vendors.Name: The Chimera's Den
vendors.Desc: Hi hello! Welcome to the Chimera's Den! I'm Chimera and owner of the shop! I am a digital fanartist and still new to vending, but I hope to do business with you soon! I sell prints and pre-orders for charms, and will be selling discounted commissions!

vendors.Name: TomoCreations
vendors.Desc:
TomoCreations, come get yah anime, nonanime, animal, reptiles and more of charms, lanyards, sticker, prints, pins and commissions.

I do take custom charm and sticker commissions!

Sticker commissions are $8 and 3in x3in can be as big as 5in x 5in.

vendors.Name: Traveling Pony Museum
vendors.Desc: The Traveling Pony Museum supports a collection of artists from around the world and has since 2012. Our shop has a little of everything and sales benefit the original artists! Minky soft artwork blankets, stickers and keychains, squishy cute mousepads, hardcover fanfiction books,  over 40 designs freshly pressed onto your choosing of size & color T-shirt or bag, and more! We pack every order with a free sticker (except Media Mail book orders, sorry - blame USPS rules!).

vendors.Name: Tsitra360 Illustration
vendors.Desc: I do prints, LIVE commissions, and licensed bags and pillow sleeves I designed.

vendors.Name: Twisted Sketch Productions
vendors.Desc: Hi there, Twisted Sketch here! I sell all kinds of things from buttons, enamel pins, stickers, vinyl decals, earrings, charm bracelets, shirts, bottles, and best of all, Commissions!

vendors.Name: Viw's Art
vendors.Desc: Selling blankets, puzzles, woodcuts & prints. Also digital commissions

vendors.Name: Watercolorheart
vendors.Desc: Stickers, posters, clothing, prints, magnets

vendors.Name: Zorilita - Mary Bellamy
vendors.Desc: Official MLP comics with my RI covers, mini prints, stickers, commissions
